generated_doNotEdit.title: Snacking Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to take a load off and snack on food that it found nearby.

fields.title: Items
fields.description: Items that we are interested in snacking on

fields.title: Snacking Cooldown
fields.description: The cooldown time in seconds before the mob is able to snack again

fields.title: Snacking Cooldown Min
fields.description: The minimum time in seconds before the mob is able to snack again

fields.title: Snacking Stop Chance
fields.description: This is the chance that the mob will stop snacking, from 0 to 1

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
